data.text: @slr_coin @BernieSpofforth The jabs were always playing Russian Roulette. Hence  they/ their families can not get any insurrance as they were aware they may dye from the jabs. German ADAC is one of them.
@BernieSpofforth No reference to the persons name means this is just propaganda.
